rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Reception Area
rooms.description: A welcoming area that sets the tone for luxury while incorporating sustainable materials and energy-efficient lighting.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Living & Kitchen Area
rooms.description: The combined living, dining and kitchen space, designed to maximize natural light and ventilation, featuring energy-efficient appliances and an eco-friendly open layout.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A courtyard that brings in natural light, fresh air, and creates a serene focal point for the home. It includes greenery and sustainable water features.

rooms.name: Servant Quarters
rooms.description: Compact yet comfortable living area for the staff, designed with functional simplicity and energy efficiency in mind.

openings.description: Energy-efficient door system with natural ventilation. Aligned as per Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large, strategically placed windows to maximize natural light and cross ventilation. Fitted with eco-friendly glass.
Dedicated entrance for staff, following Vastu guidelines for service areas, ensuring efficient use of space.

design_principles: Central courtyard for natural ventilation and light
additional_info.category: Luxury Studio Apartment Cottage with G+2 levels
